@@title User: ${id}

h2. User: ${name}
{{user_info: id:$$id}}


{{actions:
- display: Edit User
  action: '#user_edit'

- display: Delete
  action: /restmachine/system/usermanager/delete?username=${name}
  navigateback: true

- display: Add auth key
  action: /restmachine/system/usermanager/addAuthkey?username=${name}
  navigateback: true
}}

h5. Groups

{% for key in groups %}
* ${key}
{% endfor %}

h5. Emails

{% for key in emails %}
* ${key}
{% endfor %}

h5. Authkeys

{% for key in authkeys %}
* *${key}*
{% endfor %}

{{user_edit: id:$$id}}
